attributes.additional_details:
This country's citizens fought hard and long for many years to have our Animals killed as humanly as possible and that should be upheld. 
So killing for halal and kosher meat should be banned in this country and should be imported from country's who tolerate this form of killing as this is not the British way or its  values .
attributes.background: Citizens of this country find killing for halal and kosher meat very nasty cruel and barbaric way our Animals our killed, citizens find it very distressing to hear watch or listen to how are Animals our killed
